reviewText: a very good story with several plots mixed together kept my interest till the end
this was a good movie and enjoyed the subject matter. was nice to see myself in the movie also. thank you for your time on this.

I have a grandson named Kobe about the age of Cody in the film. I got this because it will show him the civil war through his eyes.  the boy even looks and acts like my Kobe.  It is a wonderful show that will develop a childs interest in American History.  I highly recmmend it to schools for students to see and discuss also.  it is quite an exciting story.  i hope many enjoy it!!
